more/even more/further/still/still more

sentences.english: Most people want a few more dollars in their wallets.
sentences.chinese: 很多人都想让自己的钱包变得更鼓一些。

sentences.english: U.S. consumers had more money and more leisure time.
sentences.chinese: 美国的消费者腰包更鼓了，有了更多的休闲时间。
